charges.charge_description: 21:846 - Conspiracy to Distribute and Possess with Intent to Distribute Cocaine(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is committed to the custody of the BOP for 24 months to be followed by a period of Supervised Release of 3 years with Special Conditions. No Fine. Special Assessment of $200.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) Possession with Intent to Distribute Cocaine; 18:2 Aiding and Abetting(2s)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is committed to the custody of the BOP for 24 months to be followed by a period of Supervised Release of 3 years with Special Conditions. No Fine. Special Assessment of $200.

charges.charge_description: 21:846 Conspracy to Distribute and to Possess with Intent to Distribute Cocaine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed upon filing of Superseding Indictment

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) Possession with Intent to Distribute Cocaine; 18:2 Aiding and Abetting(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed upon filing of Superseding Indictment

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1), 21:846....Defendant did knowingly and intentionally conspire with other persons unknown, to distribute cocaine, a Schedule II controlled substance
21:846 - Conspiracy to Distribute and Possess with Intent to Distribute Cocaine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is committed to the custody of the BOP for 132 months to be followed by a period of Supervised Release of 5 years, with Special Conditions. No Fine. Special Assessment of $100.
